name: air2firetable
description: Tools for importing data from Airtable to Firetable

scripts.fetch-schema: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js fetch-schema
scripts.fetch-tables: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js fetch-tables
scripts.process-schema: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js process-schema
scripts.process-tables: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js process-tables
scripts.import-schema: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js import-schema
scripts.import-tables: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js import-tables
scripts.all: if [ ! -d lib ]; then tsc; fi && node ./lib/index.js

author: bbox.digital
